channel.title: Cloud on Brighton JUG
channel.description: Recent content in Cloud on Brighton JUG

item.title: Quarkus for Spring Developers with Eric Deandrea
item.description: Quarkus for Spring Developers with Eric Deandrea We are very excited to welcome Eric Deandrea. He will be giving a talk on Quarkus for Spring Developers: In this session, I will show concepts and conventions familiar to Spring developers and how those same concepts and conventions can be implemented in Quarkus, all while highlighting similarities and differences between them. Additionally, I will show similarities and differences in how testing is done, highlighting Quarkus Dev Services.

item.title: Thriving in the cloud - Venturing beyond the 12 factors - Grace Jansen and Yasmin Aumeeruddy
item.description: Thriving in the cloud: Venturing beyond the 12 factors with Grace Jansen and Yasmin Aumeeruddy ———————— Event Format: This is a hybrid event, offering the option to come along in person or join us from anywhere online! We will be opening the zoom just before 6pm for people to gather and chat. ———————— We are very excited to welcome Grace Jansen and Yasmin Aumeeruddy on their Open Liberty tour. They will be giving a workshop on Thriving in the cloud: Venturing beyond the 12 factors:
